body.name: Foam Building Blocks for Toddlers 2-4, 41 Pieces EVA Soft Stacking Blocks, Baby Bath Foam Toy Set, Early Learning Construction Toys & Gifts for Kids, Boys & Girls 18+ Months
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 49 mins
features: Including 41 pcs of soft bricks in 10+ size and shapes, great value pack for building blocks game
In 5 random bright colors (red, orange, green, yellow, blue)
Playing as jigsaw / tangram puzzles, assemble numbers, letters, vehicles, animals, buildings on the floor or desktop
Playing as stacking blocks, stack the blocks up to build a colorful house, castle or other buildings from the imagination,
Playing in baby's bath time, Blocks are water-proof and light weight, will float on the water, children will have a happy time in the bath with them
Compatible blocks, can mix with other similar size of blocks
A color painted building instruction manual is included, suitable for preschool learning
Premium EVA Foam Material, high density, soft and light weight, but durable in use, 100% non-toxic and BPA Free
Great early educational toy for kids color & shape recognization, hands-on coordination, and improving their Fine Motor Skills & Other Fundamental Building & Communication Skills
Great party favor item for kids aged 18M+, suitable for pre-kindergarden classroom as well, Ideal gifts for kids in birthday, Christmas, New Years and other holidays.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kids First Building Blocks Set Incorporating blocks into playtime helps develop children's language and math skills. Children will learn the names of the colors, shapes and sizes of blocks, and improve math skills when learn to add and subtract the number of blocks needed to build the structures. building blocks are always the ideal educational toys for children to cultivate intelligence and improve skills. Soft EVA Foam Building Blocks for Toddler by Pairez Toys Including 41 pcs of soft bricks In 5 random bright colors (red, orange, green, yellow, blue) high density, soft & durable in use, 100% non-toxic and BPA Free Blocks are water-proof and light weight, will float on the water, children will have a happy time in the bath with them Compatible blocks, can mix with other similar size of blocks Pattern puzzle / Trangrams Stacking Building Blocks Game Playing in Baby Bath Time

Parent-Child Interative Toys We recommend parents to play this stacking kit with the children together, both the parents and kids will benefit from the playing time. Care Instruction Please use the soft-bristled brush to dip in the water of detergent or detergent to clean it, then rinse it off with clean water. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefect for a carnivorous infant
reviews.reviewText: Does your baby bite everything? Do you want to buy them bath toys that don't mold? Then this is the gift for you!My baby is growing teeth and all the bath toys I found would mold after a short time, were hard for her gums, needed batteries, or just sucked. We had a waitress recommend these to us and it's been great! She's been playing with them for a few months and they are still fine. We had to get rid of a few smaller pieces she was actually able to nibble pieces from but most of them have been quite sturdy.The colors are bright, the size is perfect for smaller hands, and me and my husband enjoy stacking them with her. They, also, stick the sides of the tub when wet. Overall, great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love them
reviews.reviewText: Great colorful foam block for kids. They’ve lasted a good while now with no issues. Small size for little hands works out well. Lightweight and gentle so kids won’t hurt themselves and it’s also very nice when you accidentally step on them in the middle of the night they don’t destroy your feet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Soft foam blocks. A little too soft for creative play but no chances of getting hurt when the little one decides to throw them around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps the grandkids busy.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this set to add to a set I already had. My granddaughters love to build with anything they can get their hands on. I love that the blocks are soft so they can even sit at my dining room table and play with them without doing any damage.The girls have played with my original set for about four years and are now ages 7 and 12 and still play with them whenever visiting me, especially the 7 year old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item as described
reviews.reviewText: Cute blocks for One year old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loved them
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old Granddaughter loves them. plays with them regularly. They are easy to handle amd stack. She loves knocking down Grandpas towers....Great purchase...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They stack so easily!
reviews.reviewText: These colorful blocks stack super easily and is fun for a 2 year old and adults! Very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like the material these are made of. They’re lightweight and soft, so they don’t hurt when thrown 🤦🏻‍♀️ or stepped on like normal blocks. The only downside was there were not as many blocks as I expected.
Not too many pieces and this will always be the best bath toy. Once you wet the blocks, they’ll stick together and to the wall of your tub, you can build from there.
Regalo al nipotino..molto carino e utile per bambini attenti ad innalzare torri

reviews.reviewTitle: Jeu super mais manque des pièces

reviews.reviewText: Sind super für die Kleinen Hände geeignet und sind eine tolle Beschäftigung 😊 Würde sie immer wieder kaufen 👍
No me ha gustado nada,fue una decepción al ver el mismo juego q un menor precio.
